entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Local blowing snow before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
